channel.title: What sound is this (dubstep)
channel.description: https://soundcloud.com/officialpandaeyes/panda-eyes-radiate-1 This is one of my favorite tracks, and I was wonder what dubstep sound that is used on the 2nd drop (not the melodic dubstep drop but the full dubstep drop)

item.title: What sound is this (dubstep)
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
They aren’t serious tutorials or anything tho. They’re more of just production videos for new tracks not old ones

item.title: What sound is this (dubstep)
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
DIAMOND EYES

Lol but for that sound, idk what it actually is. Probably made in Serum. Kinda sounds like a heavily modded growl. Have never used Serum so idk what he’d done with it, but he’s done some tutorials/production streams on his YT channel, so maybe u could pick up some stuff there.

Read full topic
